TextBlock.Text: SACCO: This is where the first collision occurred. Then I guess we bumped into this beautiful board. It must be quite sturdy as it doesn't have any scratches.
SACCO: But it's strange. Does that mean there was only one board like this standing upright on the hill?
MENTH: This one is definitely beautiful. I want to take it home, ... but it's a bit too heavy.
SACCO: I hear Cumin's voice somewhere nearby. Let's take a look.
